rules_text:
Incarnate {3}{W}{U} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Flying
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
